ygData.subject: RE: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Was me, but sadly those pulling days are over witht he new cazic DT s in fear. Unless i where to go solo anyways, that might work. =p Gendal Concorden, lvl
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:39 PM 12/15/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i just cowered in the corner with everyone else while a ranger or druid
>usually pulled. i know someone on the list said they were the puller on PoF
>raids though, and i feel bad but i can't remember his name (starts with G)
>though he has a 50 necro and 50 bard. sorry i have the worst name memory in
>real life too.
>
>Shada
>

Was me, but sadly those pulling days are over witht he new cazic DT's in
fear. Unless i where to go solo anyways, that might work. =p

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 50 Necro
